title: Entertainments of the cours: or, Academical conversations. Held upon the cours at Paris, by a cabal of the principal wits of that court. / Compiled by that eminent and now celebrated author, Monsieur de Marmet, Lord of Valcroissant. And rendered into English by Thomas Saintserf, Gent.
author: Marmet, Melchior de, seigneur de Valcroissant.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by T.C. and are to be sold at the three Pigeons in St. Paul's Church-yard,
